name: My first shitty game with RPG Maker MV
name_original: My first shitty game with RPG Maker MV
description:
My first EVER game, made with the easiest game-shitting software out there, RPG Maker MV, so expect REAL kwa-lity! And by that I mean, yeah, stock tiles and characters!

But hey, it's free!

Just click around the various characters and objects. I haven't even made an exit/end game option so just CTRL-Esc your way out of it.
